sprint_goal: Establish the foundational user onboarding and authentication flow: users can register with a secure password, verify their email, and log in with clear error handling.
Complete the core account lifecycle by implementing secure logout, a full password recovery flow, and specific error handling for unverified accounts.
Build the foundational user profile, allowing users to add basic info, work experience, and education. Implement profile pictures and establish the core responsive UI framework.
Implement the core networking functionality: users can send, view, accept, decline, and remove connection requests, and view their list of connections.
Launch content creation and consumption by enabling users to create text posts and view a personalized news feed of their connections' content.
Enable post interactions: users can like/unlike posts, add/delete comments, and report inappropriate content to moderators.
